game.description: A legendary dragon has appeared causing chaos and destruction in the kingdom. The king has requested for your help.
game.objective: Defeat the dragon and bring peace back to the kingdom.
game.reward: 5000 gold coins, a legendary sword, and a title of Dragon Slayer

tasks.description: Gather intelligence about the dragon by speaking to the local villagers.
Find and gather the 3 crystals of power which would weaken the dragon, scattered in three different caves.
Confront and slay the dragon in its lair atop the Dragon Mountain.

game.title: The Dragon Slayer
